archimate:Requirement.name: AC-12(3): Session Termination | Timeout Warning Message
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Display an explicit message to users indicating that the session will end in [Assignment: organization-defined time until end of session].

properties.value: To increase usability, notify users of pending session termination and prompt users to continue the session. The pending session termination time period is based on the parameters defined in the AC-12 base control.
